short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allow us to export the Komoot track in a GPX file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a "Download GPX" button to download the file, no matter which regions you have.
If you like this extension, please rate us =)
